title: FTP Weak Permissions
description: A challenge focused on exploiting weak file permissions in an FTP setup.
hints: Check for directories or files that might be accessible without proper authentication.
Anonymous FTP login might lead to interesting files being accessible.
Focus on file permissions that might allow unintended access.
learningObjectives: Understand how weak file permissions can lead to security vulnerabilities.
Learn to navigate and exploit FTP servers with misconfigurations.
Identify and exploit permission issues in server configurations.
